If you like me, Can't continue from your previous game because the game can't find your save. Try this:

#Place The entire extracted game in C/Program Files(x86)/Syndicate.

#Go to C/User/"JonDoe"/My Documents/syndicate/SaveGames. 
Copy the default folder and give it a new name. Go inside the folder and give the same name you gave the folder, to the "_profile" file. "ex. JonDoe_profile".

This worked for me when I started this game and couldn't continue from last save.

Thanks EZ!
I have the dark screen problem, in the menu, as well. I can see the cursor and hear the menu sounds but that's about it.

Nevermind. Found the fix.
If you're using AMD Radeon, go in to your Catalyst Control Center, find MidMap and set it to Quality.

Instructions:

1. Download this torrent.
2. Make sure the 3DM crack is in it.
3. Replace original with crack files to Syndicate\System\Win32_x86_Release.
4. Run Syndicate.exe in the same folder.

You do NOT have to install Syndicate, so do NOT run the setup included in this ISO. It's for Origin. I don't know if you actually need to have Origin to have the crack work because I already had it for BF3.

You WILL get a malware alert for Syndicate.exe. Trust or not, I use Comodo and although it does automatically quarantine it as malware, I turned off JUST the AV and Defense+ hasn't detected any unusual activity with it.

Been playing for a couple of hours and it works great. Hope this helps some of you guys. Running Windows 7 64-bit.

for those who are getting random crashes: I was able to fix that by doing the following:
Nvidia users. in the Nvidia control panel>manage 3d settings>threaded optimization=on
close tuners like evga precision etc.
start the game. turn v-sync on. this should fix it or atleast lower the crash frequency. it did for me

Holy fucking shit i found something that honestly I should of thought so much sooner.

If you get stuck inside the ship ever: Hold (Ctrl+Alt + `) This will open a command window and can be closed with the same key combination.

In this window type exactly (with caps and everything) that I do as follows: cmd(NoClip)

Typing that once will enable it, typing it again will turn it off.
Thank u Mahoraba33 finaly it's worked like charm
